channel.title: Thirsty Sword Lesbians (Last two Wednesdays in July, 8PM EST)
channel.description:
Last two Wednesdays in July, 8 PM EST.The title says it all. Be a thirsty sword lesbian! Sword-fight, magic, and/or romance your way through whatever fantasy world we come up with!
[date=2019-07-24 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] - [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiG0KUma5tzk192dq65](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-LiG0KUma5tzk192dq65&v=3) [date=2019-07-31 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] - [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiG0RivPBsHMdJai1-x](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-LiG0RivPBsHMdJai1-x&v=3)
